articles.title: Lawyer urges White House, DOJ to clarify app stores may continue to offer TikTok
articles.content: A lawyer for TikTok content creators on Friday urged the White House and the Justice Department to clarify to Apple and Google that they can continue to offer the TikTok short-video app in app stores...

articles.title: Embracing Stock Market Stoicism
articles.content: The market may be reaching crazy valuations and doing crazy things. The Stoics teach us to focus on what we can influence (our process) and accept what we can't (the market's whims).

articles.title: Apple pulls error-prone AI-generated news summaries in its beta iPhone software
articles.content: CUPERTINO, Calif. — Apple is suspending an error-prone feature that used artificial intelligence to deliver bogus news alerts to some iPhone owners. The decision was disclosed Thursday as part of...

articles.title: Apple Turning To Old School Strategy To Boost Underdog Division
articles.content: Apple TV+ focuses on innovation, not direct competition. An increasing awareness on the cost of content could help boost the segment's profile and improve its image.
